Text.Page:
Are you coming to tell me how I should give Khasib a chance, too? 'Cause I'm really getting tired of it.

I'd much rather talk about the insurgents' intelligence network. They're short on supplies and reinforcements.

Now that they've lost their commander, it's the perfect time to strike."What did you have in mind?"

The most important members of the intelligence network are the {@LinkCreature:32#13#Sihran arcanists} and their {@LinkCreature:32#14#tuwangi froglars}. Just eliminating them will keep dozens of soldiers safe, but if you can recover documents from them, it will help even more.

Outstanding! If Khasib is so desperate to impress me, he could do something brave and...useful! Like this!

I'm not saying he's not a good person. Just...not what I'm looking for right now.

Bah! Enough about Khasib. Here's your reward.
Didn't I tell you that the {@LinkCreature:32#14#tuwangi froglars} are in Frigid Vigil?
